name: Dodger (WillCatoProductions)
description: dodge the orange squares and the purple squares if the squares hits you you'll lose your life if you lose all your life's if it continues to hit you its game over but if theres a heart pick up you'll get a life back by getting a heart by dodging the squares if you see the heart pick up go grab the heart it will get your life back dodge as many squares as you can until the heart shows up but save your high score when its game over
